item.title: Use ADB to Push Files / Install APKs and Control Android Devices with Scrcpy
item.description: Android Debug Bridge (ADB) is a versatile command-line tool that allows users to interact with Android devices. scrcpy is a powerful tool that allows users to control and mirror Android device’s screen on computer. Prerequisites: Enable Developer Options on Android device: Go to Settings > About phone. Tap Build number 7 times until you see a message saying “You are now a developer!” Enable USB Debugging: Go to Settings > System > Developer options.
